abstract: Microsoft is responding to Opera’s accusation that bundling Internet Explorer with Windows harms the market for browsers.
snippet: Microsoft is responding to Opera’s accusation that bundling Internet Explorer with Windows harms the market for browsers.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN  Microsoft has submitted a lengthy defense in the latest European antitrust case it faces, saying its practice of bundling the Internet Explorer Web browser with the Windows operating system did not violate European law.

headline.main: Microsoft Fights Antitrust Charge Over Its Browser
headline.print_headline: Microsoft Fights Antitrust Charge Over Its Browser

abstract: Venture capitalists weighed in on the investment potential of mobile application developers.
snippet: Venture capitalists weighed in on the investment potential of mobile application developers.
lead_paragraph: Is there a Microsoft of the mobile application world?
